commands.helpText: Move to the north, if that is possible.
Move to the south, if that is possible.
Move to the east, if that is possible.
Move to the west, if that is possible.
Look around the current location for interesting things.
Pick up, retrieve, snag, snatch, grab, or otherwise obtain an item.
Drop an item. Obviously, you can't drop something you're not carrying.
Show a list of everything you are carrying.
